=== Nested let-in ===
calc : I64 -> I64
calc n = let a = (let b = 2 in b + n) in a * 3

---
(source_file
  (type_signature (identifier) (type (type_arrow (type_application (type_base (type_constructor))) (type_arrow (type_application (type_base (type_constructor)))))))
